title: A beautiful little room in a shared apartment
description: A nice group of three people awaits a new member in the apartment. All three are students at the Hochschule of Fulda and live a life of fun. So if you are interested in participating in nice evenings with kind people then this shared apartment is right for you.
bathroom_description: The bathroom is equipped with a shower and a washing machine.
kitchen_description: The kitchen has everything you need to cook a nice meal, including a new induction stove.
